title: Five Rescue 1122 couples tie the knot in Punjab - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
NAROWAL: Ten employees, male and female, of Rescue 1122 Sheikhupura recently got married, and their group photo featuring five couples has gone viral on social media.

Among the newlyweds are Muhammad Adeel, emergency medical technician, who married Naseem Akhtar, a female mail medical technician. Mubashir Naz, fire officer, tied the knot with junior computer operator Hussain Aziz. Rescue driver Mohammad Wasim married Sadra Bibi, female emergency medical technician.

Similarly, emergency medical technician Syed Hasnain Haider married Aasma Amanat, also an emergency medical technician, while rescue driver M Afrasyab wed Maria Maqsood, emergency medical technician.

According to Tajamal Hussain, spokesman for Rescue 1122 Sheikhupura, the couples have returned to work and are continuing their professional duties. He said that their performance has been better than ever following their marriages.

Published in Dawn, January 27th, 2025
